sentence.text: We further demonstrated that genetic loss of regulation of small GTPase mediated signal transduction exacerbated obesity-related metabolic disorders, while targeted activation of Fam13a in adipocytes ameliorated it in association with altered adipose tissue insulin sensitivity in mice.

entity.text: regulation of small GTPase mediated signal transduction

sentence.text: Our data unveiled a previously unknown mechanism in the regulation of adipocyte insulin signaling by regulation of small GTPase mediated signal transduction and identified its significant role in systemic metabolic homeostasis, shedding light on Fam13a as a pharmacotherapeutic target to treat obesity-related metabolic disorders

entity.text: regulation of small GTPase mediated signal transduction
